data.eml:eml: Three new species of the genus Gnamptogenys (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) from southern China with a key to the known Chinese species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Zhilin, Lattke, John E., Shi, Fuming, Zhou, Shanyi (2017): Three new species of the genus Gnamptogenys (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) from southern China with a key to the known Chinese species. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 54: 93-112, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.54.10816, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.54.10816
